dependencies: <% if (htmlWebpackPlugin.options.mode !== 'dev') { %> <% var publicPath = './'; var labkeyPath = 'experiment/gen/'; %> <% for (var chunk in htmlWebpackPlugin.files.chunks) { %> <dependency path="<%= htmlWebpackPlugin.files.chunks[chunk].entry.replace(publicPath, labkeyPath) %>"/> <% } %> <% } %>
